Lego NXT Robots

For Chrome use Right Hand Mouse Button and select "save link as".
using Chrome Save As

You may get a Restriction message similar to this, if so simply press OK and carry on possible restriction save you may get


Then find the folder you wish to download to and then press "Save"
using Chrome File Save

Lesson 4 Touch Sensor


Introduction to the Touch Sensor. We shall see how we can use it for collision detection.
The extension shows how we can give a Robot a RANDOM choice of its reaction to the collision

Downloads

Main

  • Touch Sensor Instructions PowerPoint
  • Sample Answer for Challenge 1 for MindStorm Software
  • Sample Answer for Challenge 2 for MindStorm Software

Extension

  • Touch Sensor Extension Instructions PowerPoint
  • Short Tutorial on Random Blocks video (requires headphones)
  • Sample Answer for Challenge 2 extension for MindStorm Software

Lesson 5 Text Images & Sound


You can display text and images on the Screen of the NXT Robot. The size of the screen is 89 pixels wide by 64 pixels high.

How to

  • display text on the screen
  • display images on the screen
  • create/convert our own image for displaying on the screen
  • create sounds to play from the robot

Downloads

Main

  • Converting your own image and creating sounds PowerPoint
  • Displaying Text and Images PowerPoint
  • Tutorial on Text and Images video (requires headphones)
  • Tutorial on custom sounds video (requires headphones)
  • Challenge 1 Instructions PowerPoint

Image files you can download and use

  • Use Right Mouse Button and Save As to save the images below to your area
  • Eyes Looking Left
  • Eyes Looking Right

Sound files you can download and use

  • Electric Motor Wav file
  • Monster Wav file
  • Large Industrial Robot Wav file
